resources.name: Yomitan
resources.description: Powerful browser popup dictionary for reading Japanese.
resources.descriptionLong: Yomitan (formerly Yomichan) is a browser extension that provides instant Japanese word lookups by hovering over text. It supports multiple dictionaries, Anki integration for flashcard creation, and audio pronunciation. Essential for reading Japanese online.
resources.notes: Must-have for reading Japanese on the web.

resources.name: Migaku
resources.description: Browser extension suite for immersion learning.
resources.descriptionLong: Migaku is a suite of browser extensions for immersion-based learning. It includes tools for looking up words, creating flashcards from content, and tracking learning. Works with Netflix, YouTube, and web pages.

resources.name: Language Reactor
resources.description: Learn Japanese from Netflix and YouTube.
resources.descriptionLong: Language Reactor (formerly Language Learning with Netflix) enhances Netflix and YouTube for language learning. It shows dual subtitles, provides word lookups, and lets you save vocabulary. Great for learning from content you enjoy.
resources.priceDetails: Free tier available. Pro for additional features.
resources.notes: Excellent for learning from Netflix and YouTube.

resources.name: asbplayer
resources.descriptionLong: asbplayer is a browser-based subtitle player that works with various video sources. It supports Yomitan integration, Anki card creation, and subtitle timing adjustments. Great for mining sentences from video content.
resources.notes: Powerful tool for sentence mining from video.

resources.name: Crunchyroll
resources.descriptionLong: Crunchyroll is the largest anime streaming service with thousands of shows available with Japanese audio. Watch anime in Japanese with or without subtitles for immersion practice. Many shows have Japanese subtitles available.
resources.notes: Largest anime library. Some shows have JP subtitles.

resources.name: Netflix Japan Content
resources.description: Japanese dramas and anime on Netflix.
resources.descriptionLong: Netflix offers a growing library of Japanese content including dramas, anime, and movies. Many titles include Japanese subtitles, making it excellent for immersion. Use with Language Reactor for enhanced learning.
resources.notes: Use with Language Reactor for best learning experience.

resources.name: Animelon
resources.description: Anime with Japanese subtitles for learning.
resources.descriptionLong: Animelon provides anime with Japanese subtitles specifically for language learners. The site includes vocabulary lists, subtitle timing controls, and learning features. Great for anime-based immersion.

resources.name: subs2srs
resources.description: Create Anki cards from video with subtitles.
resources.descriptionLong: subs2srs is a tool that creates Anki flashcards from video files and subtitle files. It extracts audio clips and screenshots for each subtitle line, creating immersive flashcards from your favorite content.
resources.notes: Powerful but requires setup. Windows only.

resources.name: Immersion Kit
resources.description: Search for example sentences from anime and dramas.
resources.descriptionLong: Immersion Kit lets you search for Japanese words and phrases and find example sentences from anime, dramas, and other media. Each result includes audio and video clips showing the word in context.
resources.notes: Great for finding words used in real context.

resources.name: Mokuro
resources.description: OCR tool for reading manga with lookups.
resources.descriptionLong: Mokuro is an OCR tool that processes manga images and makes the text selectable and searchable. Combined with Yomitan, it enables easy reading of manga with instant word lookups.
resources.notes: Makes manga reading with lookups possible.
